nodes.text: Manufactured by Sienar Fleet Systems, Obsidian 2 was a TIE/LN starfighter serving in the Imperial Navy's Obsidian Squadron. Obsidian 2 was piloted by Dodson Makraven, who operated under the designation of OS-72-2 and flew as wingman to Obsidian Squadron's lead pilot, Civé Rashon. At one point, Obsidian 2 flew over Cloud City on the planet Bespin.

Obsidian 2 was created for a card in the 1998 Special Edition Limited expansion set of Decipher, Inc.'s Star Wars Customizable Card Game. In 2012, Dodson Makraven appeared in the starfighter combat scenario Mission 2: Asteroid Run, which was written for the Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game and published as a rules supplement in the Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game Core Set. However, the TIE fighter that Makraven flew in that scenario was not established to be Obsidian 2.
